cyberInputMappingInfo:
</br>3. Cyber Input Variable Mapping Information:</br>
(1) position is mapped to the variable named Angle_I with an initial value set to a 1-dimensional value 5</br>
(2) When the value of Angle_I changes, let the animation rerun to the starting point and start with the updated position.</br>

(3) velocity is mapped to the variable named Luminance_I with an initial value set to a 1-dimensional value 5</br>
(4) When the value of Luminance_I changes, let the animation rerun to the starting point and start with the updated velocity.</br>
